title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for interacting with the Ollama server; install from PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG, multi-user, dark/light modes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, available on Maven Central; supports chat, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat, generate, pull, and list models.

title: ollama-cli (rust)
summary: Fast Rust CLI and REPL for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history, and completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model for private coding assistance.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and compose samples for running Ollama server and pulling models in containers.

title: ollama-chatbot (streamlit)
summary: Streamlit chatbot app that uses Ollama models with conversation memory and sidebar model switcher.

title: ollama-rag (privateGPT-style)
summary: Retrieval-augmented generation pipeline combining Ollama LLM with ChromaDB for fully private document Q&A.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama server and CLI for reproducible deployments on NixOS.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with async methods and model management.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify.ai integration that registers Ollama as a custom model provider for no-code LLM app builders.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using any Ollama model with slash commands and moderation.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted note writing and summarization powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Experimental bridge to pull and convert Hugging Face models into Ollama Modelfile format automatically.
